name: cowardice
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the behaviour of someone who is not at all brave and tries to avoid danger: Cowardice prevented me from doing what I knew I should do. You can accuse me of cowardice, but I still wouldn't fight in a war. See
coward
More examplesFewer examplesThey charged him with showing cowardice in the face of the enemy.The president called the attack "a disgraceful act of cowardice".This was no time for moral cowardice.
